snippet: The new, left-wing government of Madrid faced its first test over the weekend as the politician charged with running culture apologized for a post from 2011 that he said was taken out of context.
abstract: Madrid's Culture Min Guillermo Zapata makes joke about Holocaust on Twitter, posing test for left-wing government and prompting opposition politicians to call for his ouster; Zapata issues apology.
lead_paragraph: The new, left-wing government of Madrid faced its first test over the weekend as the politician charged with running culture apologized for a post from 2011 that he said was taken out of context.

headline.main: Spanish Official Apologizes Over Twitter Joke About Holocaust
headline.print_headline: Holocaust Twitter Joke Has Official Apologizing
